name: Two Halves (Webster Game Design)
description:
Left-brained Phil wants the apartment to be clean. Right-brained Dirt wants to mess it up for him.  Who will reign over the apartment?

Choose to play as Phil (Blue) or Dirt (Red) with a friend and play in this interactive turf war. Interact with the items in the apartment to make them clean or dirty and try to get the most items on your side before time runs out!

How to Open Game:

1. Download the .ZIP File

2. Unzip folder and open the ".exe" file

3. Enjoy your battle!
